## Chapter 5 Exercises

### Problem 5.1
```{r}


data("CPS85",package = "mosaicData")
#esquisser(CPS85)
ggplot(CPS85) +
 aes(x = sex, y = wage, fill = married) +
 geom_boxplot() +
 scale_fill_hue() +
 theme_minimal() +
 facet_wrap(vars(race))

```

### Problem 5.2

```{r}
data("NCHS",package = "dcData")
ggplot(NCHS) +
 aes(x = bmi, fill = followup, colour = sex) +
 geom_density(adjust = 1L) +
 scale_fill_gradient() +
 scale_color_hue() +
 theme_minimal() +
 facet_wrap(vars(pregnant))



```



### Problem 5.3

```{r}

data("CPS85",package = "mosaicData")
#esquisser(CPS85)
frame <- CPS85 %>% 
ggplot(aes(x = age, y = wage)) 
frame + geom_point(aes(color = married)) + facet_wrap(~sector) + coord_cartesian(xlim = c(20, 50), ylim = c(0,35))
```
